trans-unit.source: A collection that stores <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.RowStyle"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: Uma coleção que armazena <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.RowStyle"> </xref> objetos.

trans-unit.source: The TableLayoutRowStyleCollection class represents the collection of all the styles used to describe the rows in an associated <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel>.
trans-unit.target: A classe de TableLayoutRowStyleCollection representa a coleção de todos os estilos utilizados para descrever as linhas existentes num <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel> associados

trans-unit.source: Adds a new <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.RowStyle"></xref> to the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutRowStyleCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Adds a new <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.RowStyle"></xref> to the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutRowStyleCollection"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: The Add method reapplies the table layout to all the controls in the current <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel> container.
trans-unit.target: O método Add volta o esquema de tabela para todos os controlos na atual <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel>contentor.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel>

trans-unit.source: The number of styles stored in a collection is limited only by available memory.
trans-unit.target: O número de estilos armazenados numa coleção só está limitado pelo memória disponível.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.RowStyle"></xref> to add to the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutRowStyleCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.RowStyle"></xref> to add to the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutRowStyleCollection"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: The position into which the new element was inserted.
trans-unit.target: A posição para o qual é inserido o elemento de novo.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutRowStyleCollection"></xref> contains a specific style.
trans-unit.target: Determina se o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutRowStyleCollection"> </xref> contém um estilo específico.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.RowStyle"></xref> to locate in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutRowStyleCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.RowStyle"> </xref> localizar no <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutRowStyleCollection"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.RowStyle"></xref> is found in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutRowStyleCollection"></xref>; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>if the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.RowStyle"></xref> is found in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutRowStyleCollection"></xref>; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.

trans-unit.source: Determines the index of a specific item in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutRowStyleCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Determina o índice de um item específico no <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutRowStyleCollection"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The IndexOf method begins searching at the first element of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutRowStyleCollection> and ends either when it finds a match or it reaches the last element.
trans-unit.target: O método IndexOf começa a procurar no primeiro elemento do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutRowStyleCollection>e termina quando encontrar uma correspondência ou atinge o último elemento.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutRowStyleCollection>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.RowStyle"></xref> to locate in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutRowStyleCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.RowStyle"> </xref> localizar no <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutRowStyleCollection"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The index of rowStyle if found in the ; otherwise, -1.
trans-unit.target: O índice da rowStyle se encontrar no ; caso contrário, -1.

trans-unit.source: Inserts a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.RowStyle"></xref> into the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutRowStyleCollection"></xref> at the specified position.
trans-unit.target: Insere um <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.RowStyle"> </xref> para o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutRowStyleCollection"> </xref> na posição especificada.

trans-unit.source: The Insert method reapplies the table layout to all the controls in the current <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel> container.
trans-unit.target: O método Insert volta o esquema de tabela para todos os controlos na atual <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel>contentor.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel>

trans-unit.source: The number of styles stored in a collection is limited only by available memory.
trans-unit.target: O número de estilos armazenados numa coleção só está limitado pelo memória disponível.

trans-unit.source: In collections of contiguous elements, such as the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutRowStyleCollection> class, the elements that follow the insertion point move down to accommodate the inserted element.
trans-unit.target: Em coleções de elementos contíguas, tais como o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutRowStyleCollection>classe, os elementos que se seguem no ponto de inserção mover para baixo para acomodar o elemento inserido.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutRowStyleCollection>

trans-unit.source: The indexes of the elements that are moved are also updated.
trans-unit.target: Os índices de elementos que são movidos também são atualizados.

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index at which the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.RowStyle"></xref> should be inserted.
trans-unit.target: O índice baseado em zero no qual o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.RowStyle"> </xref> devem ser inseridos.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.RowStyle"></xref> to insert into the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutRowStyleCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.RowStyle"> </xref> para inserir o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutRowStyleCollection"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The value can be <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O valor pode ser <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.RowStyle"></xref> at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.RowStyle"> </xref> no índice especificado.

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.RowStyle"></xref> to get or set.
trans-unit.target: O índice baseado em zero do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.RowStyle"> </xref> obter ou definir.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.RowStyle"></xref> at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.RowStyle"> </xref> no índice especificado.

trans-unit.source: Removes the first occurrence of a specific object from the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutRowStyleCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Remove a primeira ocorrência de um objeto específico do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutRowStyleCollection"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The Remove method reapplies the table layout to all the controls in the current <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel> container.
trans-unit.target: O método de remover volta o esquema de tabela para todos os controlos na atual <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel>contentor.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel>

trans-unit.source: In collections of contiguous elements, such as the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutRowStyleCollection> class, the elements that follow the deletion point move up to occupy the vacated spot.
trans-unit.target: Em coleções de elementos contíguas, tais como o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutRowStyleCollection>classe, os elementos que se seguem o ponto de eliminação mover para cima para ocupam o lugar para cima vacated.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutRowStyleCollection>

trans-unit.source: The indexes of the elements that are moved are also updated.
trans-unit.target: Os índices de elementos que são movidos também são atualizados.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.RowStyle"></xref> to remove from the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutRowStyleCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.RowStyle"> </xref> para remover o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutRowStyleCollection"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The value can be <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O valor pode ser <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.
